attributes.action: request Ryan Giggs to become a Great British Ambassor for Sport.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Renowned for fair play, hard work, selfless devotion to his team, his charity work and citizenship, and a host of sporting successes he is unique in modern British football.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.direct.gov.uk/honours
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
